contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of September, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus are DISMISSED. See Commonwealth v. Ali, 608 Pa. 71, 10 A.3d 282 (2010) (stating that hybrid representation is not permitted). The Prothonotary is DIRECTED to forward the filings to counsel of record.
